question: NOT True about hepatorenal pouch of Morrison:
exp: CHOICE EXPLANATION & ELIMINATION REASON 1 It is the most dependent pouch of peritoneal cavity in supine posture 2 Right sub hepatic recess 3 Lesser sac is the largest recess 4 True statement
